sen.j: 建勲通（けんくんどおり）は京都市北区 (京都市)の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Kenkun-dori Street is one of the east and west street in Kita-Ward, Kyoto City.
Kenkun-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kita-Ward, Kyoto City.
Kenkun-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kita Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 船岡山の建勲神社正面に通じる。
sen.e: This street runs to in front of Kenkun Jinja Shrine in Funaokayama.
The street runs in front of Kenkun Jinja Shrine in Funaokayama.
The street runs in front of Kenkun-jinja Shrine in Mt. Funaoka.
sen.cmt: Kenkun-jinja Shrine, Mt. Funaokaとしました。

sen.j: ほぼ並行して北から建勲北通、建勲北中通、建勲通と並ぶ。
sen.e: It runs almost parallel to Kenkunkita-dori Street, Kenkunkitanaka-dori Street and Kenkun-dori Street from north.
From the north, it runs almost parallel to Kenkunkita-dori Street, Kenkunkitanaka-dori Street and Kenkun-dori Street.
From the north, it runs almost parallel to Kenkunkita-dori Street, Kenkunkitanaka-dori Street and Kenkun-dori Street.

sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更
